sourcesContent:
<template>
  Home
</template>

<script>

import {inject, onMounted, ref, watch} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "Home",
  setup(props){
    onMounted(()=>{
      const mqttClient = inject('mqttClient')
      let mqtt = ref(null)

      mqttClient
          .then((client) => {
            client.on('connect', ()=> {
              mqtt = client
              test(client)
            })

          })
          .catch((err) => {
            console.log(err)
          });
    })

    const test = (client)=>{
      client.subscribe('test')
      client.publish('test', 'lol')
    }






  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
